verses.name: Judges 5:24
verses.text: Blessed above women shall Jael the wife of Heber the Kenite be, blessed shall she be above women in the tent.

verses.name: Judges 5:25
verses.text: He asked water, and she gave him milk; she brought forth butter in a lordly dish.

verses.name: Judges 5:26
verses.text: She put her hand to the nail, and her right hand to the workmen’s hammer; and with the hammer she smote Sisera, she smote off his head, when she had pierced and stricken through his temples.

verses.name: Judges 5:27
verses.text: At her feet he bowed, he fell, he lay down: at her feet he bowed, he fell: where he bowed, there he fell down dead.
